/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++    -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.11.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/playground.dir/main.cpp.o  -o playground  -L/Users/yjiang6/Documents/Programming/shaderplayground/lib -Wl,-rpath,/Users/yjiang6/Documents/Programming/shaderplayground/lib  -lGLEW -lglfw3 -lSOIL libshader.a -framework Cocoa -framework OpenGL -framework CoreVideo -framework IOKit
